text: @RepMarkGreen @SpeakerPelosi @realDonaldTrump But, but Rep Green don’t YOU want to know what went wrong with COVID-19 response so it can be fixed? Next time don’t you want to save Americans lives? Are you and rest of GOP afraid what the commission will find?
